headline: 3 Dividend-Paying and/or Blue-Chip Stocks Perfect for Baby Boomers to Add to Their Portfolios -- Including Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway
summary: Dividend-paying stocks are an excellent choice for investors in or near retirement.
